content: शिबिः(विः) {@--1@} A beast of prey. {@--2@} The birch tree. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country (pl). {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a king (who is said to have saved {%Agni%} in the form of a dove from Indra in the form of a hawk by offering an equal quantity of his own flesh weighed in a balance); <ls>Mu. 6. 17.</ls>
शिविः {@--1@} A beast of prey. {@--2@} The birch tree.
